Summary: Biochemical reaction from clopidogrel to clopidogrel carboxylic acid. This interaction is catalyzed by CES1.
Biochemical reaction from 2-oxo-clopidogrel, glutathione to clopidogrel thiol metabolite H4. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from 2-oxo-clopidogrel to clopidogrel thiol metabolite H3. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from clopidogrel to 2-oxo-clopidogrel. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP1A2, CYP2C19 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from 2-oxo-clopidogrel to clopidogrel endo-thiol. This interaction is catalyzed by PON1.
Biochemical reaction from clopidogrel carboxylic acid to clopidogrel acyl glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B4 or UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from 2-oxo-clopidogrel to clopidogrel thiol metabolite H2.
clopidogrel thiol metabolite H4 inhibits P2RY12.
Transport from clopidogrel to clopidogrel. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
